summary.title: New Features for Enhanced Collaboration
summary.summary: We're excited to announce several new features designed to improve teamwork and productivity. These updates include real-time collaborative editing, advanced commenting tools, and streamlined project management capabilities. Explore these new tools to elevate your collaborative workflow.

2026-01-01.content:
Gemini Cloud Assist release notes are now published here. If you are
looking for Gemini Cloud Assist release notes prior to January 2026,
see the [Gemini for Google Cloud release notes](https://docs.cloud.google.com/gemini/docs/release-notes).

summary.title: Gemini Cloud Assist Documentation Now Available
summary.summary: Gemini Cloud Assist release notes are now published in this location. For release notes prior to January 2026, please refer to the Gemini for Google Cloud release notes.
